text: Teuma meu ka lheuh dum taseumbahyang Taingat Tuhan bek sagai salah Tadong got taduek got watee taeh Ate lam meuceh taingat Allah Meunyo ka aman gata ka teunang Pubuet seumbahyang lagee sot bagah Keubit seumbahyang perlee that-that Mukmin dum meuhat han jeut jikeubah Bek sagai tinggai bak jeut-jeut watee Ka Iheuh meuteuntee bandum geupeugah
